00113 template <class T>
00114 class EGS_CYLINDERS_EXPORT EGS_CylindersT : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00115 protected:
00116 
00117     EGS_Float *R,  
00118               *R2; 
00119     EGS_Vector xo; 
00120     T a;           
00121 
00122 #ifdef CYL_DEBUG
00123     EGS_Vector last_x, last_u;
00124     EGS_Float  last_t, last_d, last_B, last_A;
00125     int        last_ireg, last_dir;
00126 #endif
00127 
00128 public:
00129 
00134     ~EGS_CylindersT() {
00135         if (nreg) {
00136             delete [] R;
00137             delete [] R2;
00138         }
00139     };
00140 
00148     EGS_CylindersT(int nc, const EGS_Float *radius,
00149                    const EGS_Vector &position, const string &Name,
00150                    const T &A) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), a(A), xo(position) {
00151         if (nc>0) {
00152             R=new EGS_Float [nc];
00153             R2=new EGS_Float [nc];
00154 
00155             for (int i=0; i<nc; i++) {
00156                 R[i]=radius[i];
00157                 R2[i]=radius[i]*radius[i];
00158             }
00159             nreg=nc;
00160         }
00161     };
00162 
00164     EGS_CylindersT(const vector<EGS_Float> &radius,
00165                    const EGS_Vector &position, const string &Name,
00166                    const T &A) : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name), a(A), xo(position) {
00167         if (radius.size()>0) {
00168             R=new EGS_Float [radius.size()];
00169             R2=new EGS_Float [radius.size()];
00170 
00171             for (int i=0; i<radius.size(); i++) {
00172                 R[i]=radius[i];
00173                 R2[i]=radius[i]*radius[i];
00174             }
00175             nreg=radius.size();
00176         }
00177     };
00178 
00179     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00180         EGS_Vector rc(x-xo);
00181         EGS_Float rp=a*rc, rho_sq=rc.length2()-rp*rp;
00182         if (rho_sq>R2[nreg-1]) {
00183             return false;
00184         }
00185         return true;
00186     };
00187 
00188     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00189         EGS_Vector rc(x-xo);
00190         EGS_Float rp=a*rc, rho_sq=rc.length2()-rp*rp;
00191         if (rho_sq>R2[nreg-1]) {
00192             return -1;
00193         }
00194         if (rho_sq<R2[0]) {
00195             return 0;
00196         }
00197         return findRegion(rho_sq,nreg-1,R2)+1;
00198     };
00199 
00200     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00201         EGS_Vector rc(x-xo);
00202         EGS_Float
00203         rp=a*rc,
00204         rho_sq=rc.length2()-rp*rp;
00205 
00206         if (rho_sq>R2[nreg-1]) {
00207             return -1;    // outside all cylinders
00208         }
00209         if (rho_sq<R2[0]) {
00210             return 0;    // inside central cylinder
00211         }
00212 
00213         // find particle region
00214         int ic=0,oc=nreg,ms;
00215         while (oc-ic>1) {
00216             ms=(ic+oc)/2;
00217             if (rho_sq<R2[ms]) {
00218                 oc=ms;
00219             }
00220             else {
00221                 ic=ms;
00222             }
00223         }
00224         return oc;
00225     };
00226 
00227     EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00228                               const EGS_Vector &u) {
00229         if (ireg < 0) {
00230             return 0;
00231         }
00232         EGS_Float up=a*u;
00233         if (fabs(up)>=1) {
00234             return 1e30;    // parallel to axis
00235         }
00236         EGS_Float A=1-up*up;
00237         EGS_Vector rc(x-xo);
00238         EGS_Float rcp=a*rc, urc=u*rc;
00239         EGS_Float C=rc.length2()-rcp*rcp-R2[nreg-1];
00240         if (C >= 0) {
00241             return 0;    // outside within precision
00242         }
00243         EGS_Float B=urc-up*rcp;
00244         EGS_Float Dsq = sqrt(B*B-A*C);
00245         EGS_Float d = B > 0 ? -C/(Dsq + B) : (Dsq - B)/A;
00246         return d;
00247     };
00248 
00249     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00250                EGS_Float &t, int *newmed = 0, EGS_Vector *normal = 0) {
00251 
00252         EGS_Float d=1e30;  // large distance to any boundry
00253 
00254         // projections
00255         double up=a*u;
00256         if (fabs(up)>=1) {
00257             return ireg;    // parallel to cylinder axis
00258         }
00259         double A=1-up*up;        // d^2 coefficient
00260 
00261         int dir=-1; // direction entering or exiting cylinder boundry
00262 
00263         EGS_Vector rc(x-xo);
00264         double rcp=a*rc, urc=u*rc;
00265         double B=urc-up*rcp;  // d^1 coefficient
00266 
00267         EGS_Float rad;
00268 
00269         // in any region?
00270         if (ireg>=0) {
00271 
00272             double C=rc.length2()-rcp*rcp-R2[ireg]; // d^0 coefficient
00273 
00274             // B>=0 ... particle travelling radially outwards
00275             if (B>=0 || !ireg) { // OR it is IN the centre cylinder
00276                 rad = -R[ireg];
00277                 dir=ireg+1;
00278                 if (dir >= nreg) {
00279                     dir = -1;
00280                 }
00281                 double Dsq = B*B-A*C;
00282                 if (Dsq > 0) {
00283                     Dsq = sqrt(Dsq);
00284                 }
00285                 else {
00286                     if (Dsq < -1e-2) egsWarning("\nEGS_CylindersT::howfar(): "
00287                                                     "the particle may not be in the region\n   we think it "
00288                                                     "is as Dsq = %g\n",Dsq);
00289                     Dsq = 0;
00290                 }
00291                 //d=-B+sqrt(B*B-A*C);
00292                 d = B > 0 ? -C/(Dsq + B) : (Dsq - B)/A;
00293                 if (d < 0) {
00294                     if (C > 1e-2) {
00295                         egsWarning("\nEGS_CylindersT::howfar(): the particle "
00296                                    "may not be in the region\n   we think it is as "
00297                                    "Cout = %g\n",C);
00298                         egsWarning("   ireg=%d R2=%g R2[%d]=%g\n",ireg,
00299                                    rc.length2()-rcp*rcp,ireg,R2[ireg]);
00300                         egsWarning("x=(%g,%g,%g) u=(%g,%g,%g)\n",
00301                                    x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z);
00302                         egsWarning("B=%g A=%g\n",B,A);
00303 #ifdef CYL_DEBUG
00304                         egsWarning("last:\n");
00305                         egsWarning("x=(%g,%g,%g) u=(%g,%g,%g)\n",
00306                                    last_x.x,last_x.y,last_x.z,last_u.x,last_u.y,last_u.z);
00307                         egsWarning("B=%g A=%g ireg=%d inew=%d\n",
00308                                    last_B,last_A,last_ireg,last_dir);
00309                         egsWarning("t=%g d=%g\n",last_t,last_d);
00310 #endif
00311                     }
00312                     d = 1e-16;
00313                 }
00314             }
00315 
00316             // check for intersection with inner cylinder
00317             else {
00318                 double dR2=R2[ireg]-R2[ireg-1];
00319                 C+=dR2;
00320                 double D_sq=B*B-A*C;
00321 
00322                 if (D_sq<=0) { // outer cylinder intersection
00323                     rad = -R[ireg];
00324                     dir=ireg+1;
00325                     if (dir >= nreg) {
00326                         dir = -1;
00327                     }
00328                     /*
00329                     D_sq+=A*C;               // should we not use
00330                     C-=dR2;                  // d = -B + sqrt(D_sq+A*dR2)
00331                     d=-B+sqrt(D_sq-A*C);     // instead?
00332                     */
00333                     D_sq += A*dR2;
00334                     if (D_sq > 0) {
00335                         D_sq = sqrt(D_sq);
00336                     }
00337                     else {
00338                         if (D_sq < -1e-2)
00339                             egsWarning("\nEGS_CylindersT::howfar(): the "
00340                                        "particle may not be in the region\n   we think "
00341                                        "it is as D_sq = %g\n",D_sq);
00342                         D_sq = 0;
00343                     }
00344                     d = (D_sq - B)/A;
00345                 }
00346 
00347                 else  { // inner cylinder intersection
00348                     dir=ireg-1;
00349                     rad = R[dir];
00350                     //d=-B-sqrt(D_sq);
00351                     d = C/(sqrt(D_sq) - B);
00352                     if (d < 0) {
00353                         if (C < -1e-2) egsWarning("EGS_CylindersT::howfar(): "
00354                                                       "the particle may not be in the region we think it "
00355                                                       "is as Cin = %g\n",C);
00356                         d = 1e-16;
00357                     }
00358                 }
00359             }
00360         }
00361 
00362         else {  // outside all regions
00363             if (B<0) { // particle travelling radially inwards
00364                 double C=rc.length2()-rcp*rcp-R2[nreg-1],
00365                        D_sq=B*B-A*C;
00366 
00367                 if (D_sq>0) { // cylinder intersection
00368                     dir=nreg-1;
00369                     rad = R[dir];
00370                     //d=-B-sqrt(D_sq);
00371                     d = C/(sqrt(D_sq) - B);
00372                     if (d < 0) {
00373                         if (C < -1e-2) {
00374                             egsWarning("EGS_CylindersT::howfar(): "
00375                                        "we think that the particle is outside, but C=%g\n",C);
00376                             egsWarning("  d=%g B=%g D_sq=%g\n",d,B,D_sq);
00377                             egsWarning("  ireg=%d x=(%g,%g,%g) u=(%g,%g,%g)\n",
00378                                        ireg,x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z);
00379                         }
00380                         d = 1e-16;
00381                     }
00382                 }
00383             }
00384             else {
00385                 return ireg;
00386             }
00387         }
00388         //d/=A;
00389 
00390 #ifdef CYL_DEBUG
00391         if (isnan(d)) {
00392             egsWarning("d is nan: A=%g B=%g ireg=%d R2=%g\n",
00393                        A,B,ireg,rc.length2()-rcp*rcp);
00394         }
00395 
00396         last_x = x;
00397         last_u = u;
00398         last_B = B;
00399         last_A = A;
00400         last_ireg = ireg;
00401         last_dir = dir;
00402         last_t = t;
00403         last_d = d;
00404 #endif
00405 
00406         // correct t-step
00407         if (d<t) {
00408             t=d;
00409             if (newmed) if (dir >= 0) {
00410                     *newmed = medium(dir);
00411                 }
00412                 else {
00413                     *newmed=-1;
00414                 }
00415             if (normal) {
00416                 EGS_Vector n(rc + u*t - a*(rcp+up*t));
00417                 *normal = n*(1/rad);
00418             }
00419             return dir;
00420         }
00421         return ireg;
00422     };
00423 
00424     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00425         EGS_Vector rc(x-xo);
00426         EGS_Float
00427         rcp=a*rc,
00428         rho=sqrt(rc.length2()-rcp*rcp);
00429 
00430         // check outer cylinder first if inside geometry
00431         if (ireg>=0) {
00432             EGS_Float d=R[ireg]-rho;
00433 
00434             if (ireg) {
00435                 EGS_Float dd=rho-R[ireg-1];
00436                 if (dd<d) {
00437                     d=dd;
00438                 }
00439             }
00440 
00441             return d;
00442 
00443         }
00444 
00445         else {
00446             return rho-R[nreg-1];
00447         }
00448     };
00449 
00450     int getMaxStep() const {
00451         return 2*nreg + 1;
00452     };
00453 
00454     const string &getType() const {
00455         return a.getType();
00456     };
00457 
00458     void printInfo() const {
00459         EGS_BaseGeometry::printInfo();
00460         a.printInfo();
00461         egsInformation(" midpoint of cylinders = (%g,%g,%g)\n",xo.x,xo.y,xo.z);
00462         egsInformation(" cylinder radii = ");
00463         for (int j=0; j<nreg; j++) {
00464             egsInformation("%g ",R[j]);
00465         }
00466         egsInformation("\n");
00467         egsInformation("=====================================================\n");
00468     };
00469 };

00473 public:
00474     XProjector() {};
00475     EGS_Float operator*(const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00476         return x.x;
00477     };
00478     EGS_Vector operator*(EGS_Float t) const {
00479         return EGS_Vector(t,0,0);
00480     };
00481     EGS_Float length() const {
00482         return 1;
00483     };

00485         return type;
00486     };
00487     void printInfo() const {};
00488 private:
00489     static string type;
00490 };

00532 class EGS_CYLINDERS_LOCAL Projector {
00533 public:
00534     Projector(const EGS_Vector &A) : a(A) {
00535         norm = a.length();
00536         a.normalize();
00537     };
00538     EGS_Float operator*(const EGS_Vector &x) const {
00539         return a*x;
00540     };
00541     EGS_Vector operator*(EGS_Float t) const {
00542         return a*t;
00543     };
00544     EGS_Float length() const {
00545         return norm;
00546     };
00547     string &getType() const {
00548         return type;
00549     };
00550     void printInfo() const {
00551         egsInformation(" axis = (%g,%g,%g)\n",a.x,a.y,a.z);
00552     };
00553 
00554 private:
00555     EGS_Vector a;
00556     EGS_Float  norm;
00557     static string type;
00558 };
